data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Khowai, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Khowai, Tripura, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 20,100 people living in Khowai through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next week in Khowai, Tripura, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, let the threatened of Khowai, Tripura, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the county of Khowai.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Chaimal people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Khowai access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 221 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.section_summary:
the county of Khowai, Tripura, India has a population of 20,100.

We estimate Khowai has 221 people who might know Jesus, 244 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 19,635 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Khowai, Tripura, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.
